overview: This critically acclaimed anthology sees a young couple planning to purchase an old home, but would like one last tour before the closing. They're guided around the estate by a realtor that may have more in store than they bargained for. Searching floor by floor, they begin to discover seven tales of terror, that will leave you asking...How many stories does your home have?
tagline: How many stories does your house have?
title: Volumes of Blood: Horror Stories
